TITLE: Bed Bath & Beyond's supply chain issues hammered results. Its stock is up anyway
SUMMARY: Bed Bath & Beyond CEO Mark Tritton said a lack of inventory due to supply chain bottlenecks cost Bed Bath & Beyond about $100 million.

SUMMARY: Walgreens said it administered 15.6 million Covid vaccines in the latest quarter — bringing its total to more than 56 million to date.

SUMMARY: TSMC, which makes chips for companies like Apple, reported a sixth straight quarter of record sales as demand for its products rose amid a supply crunch.

SUMMARY: J&J's revenue of $24.8 billion rose 10.4%, mostly driven by $1.82 billion in international sales of its Covid vaccine.

SUMMARY: Azure cloud growth slowed below the 50% mark again even as Microsoft's customers enter longer-term contracts. Windows license revenue jumped 25%.

SUMMARY: Intel said it expected $18.3 billion in adjusted sales in the first quarter of 2022, beating consensus analyst expectations of $17.62 billion.

SUMMARY: Deliveries of Boeing's 787 Dreamliner plane have been paused for most of the last 15 months.

SUMMARY: The newly public brokerage anticipates first-quarter revenue of less than $340 million, down 35% compared to 2021.

SUMMARY: Qualcomm said it expected between $10.2 billion and $11 billion in sales in the upcoming quarter, ahead of analyst estimates of $9.6 billion.

SUMMARY: In Q1 2022, Spotify expects to report 418 million monthly active users. Analysts anticipated guidance of 417.8 million, according to StreetAccount.

SUMMARY: Shell announced an $8.5 billion share buyback program in the first half of 2022 and expects to raise its dividend by 4% to $0.25 per share in the first quarter.

SUMMARY: Ford Motor reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

SUMMARY: BP's results come at a time when millions of U.K. households are facing a record-breaking increase in their energy bills amid a cost of living crisis.

SUMMARY: "We followed the buoyant economy," CFO Lars Machenil told CNBC as the results were published.

SUMMARY: The burrito chain is facing higher costs for labor and ingredients, but price hikes helped offset their impact.

SUMMARY: Taco Bell, KFC and Pizza Hut all saw company restaurant margins shrink during the quarter.

SUMMARY: Zillow said on Thursday in its fourth-quarter earnings report that its winding down its home-flipping business at a rapid clip.

SUMMARY: SMIC, China's largest chipmaker, is seen as a key player in Beijing's ambitions to become more self-sufficient in the semiconductor industry.
